fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Roleblock a player. If they were using a single-target ability, copy it for yourself.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You won't know the ability you copied, though you will receive feedback.
- If the ability requires attributes to function, you will unknowingly give yourself those attributes on the night you use the ability.
- You can use multiple abilities per night.
- You can't target yourself.
